sense.def:
Kadar je človek
mixed up
, ne ve, kaj bi.

seg.quote: I got mixed up and forgot which one I'd gone to first.
Tim was in a strange mixed-up frame of mind.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
mixed up in a crime or a scandal
, je povezan z zločinom ali škandalom.

seg.quote: I wasn't mixed up in it myself.

sense.def:
Kadar stvari postanejo
mixed up
, v njih nastane nered.

seg.quote: The letters had got too mixed up to be sorted out easily.
